commit message: fixed behavior when a phone call is received during playback
trying to figure out how to receive bluetooth media button presses. No luck yet
improved handling of weird file names
Fixed invalid name handling in album list
made the playback service a foreground service
the music playback service now reports its state to the now playing window
minor refactoring to clarify attribute names and cleanup code, a couple fixes to song ordering
added saving of artist list position and service stopping
added saving of artist list position and service stopping
clicking on the playback notification does stuff now
added GPL license, passing artist and album to not playing
disabled clicking on the playing status bar
Fixed an issue where the nowplaying activity would be double launched
didn't need the auto generated files
turns out registration with the audio manager is pretty important
Fixed an issue with the service crashing during phone calls
added the Here option to the top of the list
updated notification text to include artist
default directory is now ext storage / music
improved handling of artists without albums
added more acceptable file formats according to the android documentation
modified the playback service to restart the song if previous is called more than three seconds in
added message to display when no artists are found
code fixes for icon name changes
updating icons for the playback service, switching strings to use the string resource xml file, and fixing warnings
fixed handling of songs which don't have a numerical prefix but still have a media type suffix
added icons to the directory selection dialog
fixed ordering when all is selected
changed the here to the current path
updated the service to resume playback after losing focus, as long as it's been less than 30 seconds
fixing error where the application fails to exit
brief headphone disconnects don't cause the music to stop
fixed issue with pause delay on headphone disconnect
fixed null pointer exception that could occur while shutting down
added null ptr check for the intent when starting the service
added block to catch null albumDirName. I dont know the cause of the null albumDirName, but this will hopefully fix it
re-worked the now playing layout so it looks like a proper app
colors for the new layout of now playing
